DOC.brief_summary: An open-label, multiple-dose study to evaluate the pharmacokinetic drug-drug interaction of amlodipine and rosuvastatin in healthy adult male subjects.
DOC.criteria: BMI 1829 signed the informed consent form prior to the study participation Clinically significant disease Previously donate whole blood within 60 days or component blood within 14 days Clinically significant allergic disease Taken IP in other trial within 90 days An impossible one who participates in clinical trial by investigator's decision including laboratory test result
